price: Kuma ka ce: "Ku yi aiki, sa'an nan Allah zai ga aikinku, da Manzon Sa da Muminai kuma zã a mayar da ku zuwa ga masanin fake da bayyane, sa'an nan Ya bã ku lãbãri ga abin da kuka kasance kunã aikatãwa."
arabic: وَقُلِ ٱعۡمَلُواْ فَسَيَرَى ٱللَّهُ عَمَلَكُمۡ وَرَسُولُهُۥ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَۖ وَسَتُرَدُّونَ إِلَىٰ عَٰلِمِ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَٱلشَّهَٰدَةِ فَيُنَبِّئُكُم بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waquli iʿ'malū fasayarā al-lahu ʿamalakum warasūluhu wal-mu'minūna wasaturaddūna ilā ʿālimi al-ghaybi wal-shahādati fayunabbi-ukum bimā kuntum taʿmalūna
translations: And you will be brought back
